current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To require the Inspector General of the Department of Veterans Affairs to submit a report on wait
			 times for veterans seeking medical appointments and treatment from the
			 Department of Veterans Affairs, to prohibit closure of medical facilities
			 of the Department, and for other purposes.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 S2316 IS: To require the Inspector General of the Department of Veterans Affairs to submit a report on wait times for veterans seeking medical appointments and treatment from the Department of Veterans Affairs, to prohibit closure of medical facilities of the Department, and for other purposes.
